hero.title: Welcome to ClearPaths Marketing
hero.description: We're a dynamic face-to-face marketing and outreach company committed to connecting communities with purpose-driven organizations. If you're looking to make a real impact while building valuable skills in a supportive environment, we want to meet you.

intro.title: What We Do
intro.description: At ClearPaths Marketing, we specialize in direct community engagement and brand awareness for organizations that matter. Our professional field teams connect people face-to-face with causes they care about, building lasting relationships and creating meaningful conversations that drive real change.

about.title: About ClearPaths Marketing
about.description: ClearPaths Marketing is a community outreach and direct engagement company focused on helping organizations connect with people through meaningful, face-to-face conversations.
about.missionText: Our mission is to create positive community impact while developing individuals into confident professionals through hands-on experience, mentorship, and continuous learning.

values.title: Integrity
values.description: Honest and respectful communication in every interaction.

values.title: Impact
values.description: Supporting initiatives that create meaningful change.

values.title: Teamwork
values.description: Success achieved through collaboration and support.

about.cultureText: We foster a high-energy, supportive environment where individuals are encouraged to grow at their own pace. Daily coaching, team collaboration, and leadership development are core parts of our culture.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We specialize in direct community engagement and face-to-face outreach.

items.title: Face-to-Face Outreach Campaigns
items.description: Our representatives engage directly with communities through residential and public outreach campaigns, creating authentic conversations that build trust and awareness.

items.title: Community Engagement
items.description: We help organizations strengthen their presence by connecting directly with local communities through meaningful interactions and education-focused outreach.

items.title: Donor & Supporter Acquisition
items.description: Through professional communication and relationship-building, our teams help organizations expand their supporter base and increase long-term engagement.

items.title: Brand Awareness Initiatives
items.description: We represent partner organizations in public environments, helping communicate their mission clearly and effectively to new audiences.

items.title: Event & Field Marketing
items.description: Our teams participate in community events and outreach activities designed to increase visibility and public engagement.

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.description: We're looking for motivated individuals who want to make a real impact while building valuable professional skills. If you're confident, communicative, and ready to represent meaningful organizations in your community, we'd love to meet you.
careers.dayInRole: Your typical day includes initial team training and briefings in the office, followed by out-of-office engagement with community members. You'll be representing partner organizations, having meaningful conversations, and helping connect people to causes they care about.
responsibilities: Represent partner organizations professionally and authentically
Engage in one-on-one conversations with community members
Present campaign information clearly and confidently
Build genuine relationships and answer questions
Attend daily training and coaching sessions
Meet individual and team performance goals
careers.schedule: Monday to Friday, 12:30 PM – 8:30 PM | Mix of office training and field outreach work
careers.compensation: Daily base support + performance-based commissions. New: $500–$800/week | Developing: $800–$1,200/week | Experienced: $1,000–$1,500+/week
careers.growth: We promote from within and develop our team members into leadership roles. With dedication, you can advance into coaching, team lead, and management positions as you grow with us.
careers.applySection: Interested? Apply now to join the ClearPaths team and start making an impact.

community.title: Creating Meaningful Impact
community.engagement: Through face-to-face outreach, our teams connect communities with humanitarian and nonprofit organizations that are making a real difference. Every conversation builds awareness, educates people about important causes, and creates opportunities for meaningful involvement. We believe personal interaction creates stronger understanding and lasting community support.
community.commitment: We're committed to ethical, respectful outreach that represents our partner organizations with professionalism and integrity. Every team member is trained to communicate with respect and authenticity.

cta.title: Ready to start your career with ClearPaths Marketing?
cta.description: Apply today and a member of our recruitment team will contact shortlisted candidates.

items.question: Do I need previous experience?
items.answer: No. Full training and ongoing mentorship are provided.

items.question: Is this a door-to-door role?
items.answer: The position involves face-to-face outreach and community engagement campaigns conducted in residential and public environments.

items.question: Is a vehicle required?
items.answer: No vehicle or driver's license is required.

items.question: Are there any fees to join?
items.answer: No. Training, materials, and onboarding are provided at no cost.

items.question: What are the working hours?
items.answer: Monday to Friday, typically from 12:30 PM to 8:30 PM.

items.question: How does compensation work?
items.answer: Compensation includes daily base support along with performance-based commissions.
